It serves approximately 2 million families, businesses, and manufacturing plants through approximately 50,000 kilometer of gas transport pipeline and distribution network systems in the Buenos Aires, La Pampa, NeuquÃ©n, Chubut, RÃ­o Negro, Santa Cruz, and Tierra del Fuego provinces. The company is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.

DGCU2.BA.summary: Distribuidora de Gas Cuyana S.A. distributes natural gas in the CÃ³rdoba, Mendoza, La Rioja, San Luis, Catamarca, and San Juan provinces of Argentina. It serves approximately 1,283,095 customers, including residential and commercial customers in 268 locations through a distribution network of 30,939 km. GBAN.BA.summary: Naturgy BAN, S.A. engages in natural gas distribution business. The company was formerly known as Gas Natural Ban, S.A. and changed its name to Naturgy BAN, S.A. in January 2019. Naturgy BAN, S.A. is based in Buenos Aires, Argentina.
